title: Google TV supports video answers to Assistant questions
content:
Google TV’s integration with Google Assistant makes it possible to control smart home devices, find movies and TV shows, and more. Now, Google Assistant on Google TV can offer direct video results for questions powered by YouTube.

more…

The post Google TV supports video answers to Assistant questions appeared first on 9to5Google.
description: Google Assistant on Google TV now has the ability to play videos as direct answers to your questions, mostly pulling from YouTube.
